column5: anyone in the Windsor area the Columbia Outlet has Columbia PFG fishing vests on clearance from regular price of 100 bucks marked down to 19.99. Two different styles good selection left on friday evening when I was there. Very nice vest. I picked up 2.
Dang, that's one good thing about being close to Windsor!  I remember hitting that outlet a long time ago...still have my $20 one-piece snowsuit!  Thanks for sharing the good news, Bowslayer
